metadata.name: The Manhattan Fawn
metadata.description:
The photographic illustrations of the Manhattan Bridge were created with the intention of creating distinct visual worlds from the same reality. 

I have always perceived life as a very textured vibratory state with many cavities, roughness, life is never smooth, it is these different textures that generate our daily life.

Three visuals, three different atmospheres, a multitude of textures in opposition with the central part of the bridge which is relatively smooth, at least in appearance...

Edition: 1/1
Size: 8000 x 5340 pixels
Format: JPG
Technique: Mix media, composite: Photography + Digital Art
Software used: Adobe Photoshop, Topaz Lab and creativity
